Grab all the sizes by name the print the in equivalent
------------------------------------------------------

>>> import print2pixel as p2p
>>> for group in p2p.sizes:
...    for item in group[0]:
...      print item
...      p2p.get_size_by_name(item)
... 
oficio
('in', 8.5, 14)
tabloid
('in', 11, 17)
chilean-legal
('in', 8.5, 13)
ledge
('in', 17, 11)

legal

letter
